enhanced_posts.text:
Jesus, did "conservatives" just wake from a coma?

#trump 's approval rating has suddenly dropped among conservative adults.  According to polls by The Economist/YouGov, the president's net approval rating has declined by 15 percentage points from July to August. 

Dump #trump. Cancel the #gop.
